last_episode_to_air.name: All the Way From There Just to Get to Here
last_episode_to_air.overview: Kavita’s article goes to print, causing an all-out battle. Lin seizes an opportunity to escape. Season finale.

name: Shantaram
overview: Escaped convict Lin Ford flees to the teeming streets of 1980s Bombay, looking to disappear. Working as a medic for the city’s poor and neglected, Lin finds unexpected love, connection, and courage on the long road to redemption.

episodes.name: The Three Nos
episodes.overview: After escaping an Australian prison, Lin embraces a new life in India, where he soon becomes entangled in a web of love and deceit.

episodes.name: Down and Out
episodes.overview: A desperate Lin needs new documents as his friendship with Prabhu grows. Karla reveals Lisa’s secret and wrestles with her feelings for Lin.

episodes.name: Strange Bedfellows
episodes.overview: When a catastrophe hits Sagar Wada, Lin steps in as the community’s doctor. Zhou’s ambitions rise, and Khader pulls Lin into the fold.

episodes.name: Bad Medicine
episodes.overview: Lin finds his priorities pulled in two directions: the people of Sagar Wada and Khader’s underground network.

episodes.name: The Sin in the Crime
episodes.overview: Tensions mount between Maurizio and Lin. Qasim Ali fears what Lin’s friendship with Abdullah means. Meanwhile, Lin and Karla grow closer.

episodes.name: Dead Man Walking
episodes.overview: Kavita gets closer to discovering the truth about Lin. Modena ignores Lisa’s warnings about Maurizio. Lin and Vikram attempt to save Didier.

episodes.name: Apo Vai Pranah
episodes.overview: As cholera hits Sagar Wada, Lin tries to fight the outbreak. Khader gains leverage over Pandey, and Maurizio expands his business.

episodes.name: Like in the Time of Cholera
episodes.overview: Karla nurses a deliriously sick Lin back to health, complicating things between them even more. Lin seeks Khader’s help, much to Qasim Ali’s disdain.

episodes.name: Should I Stay or Should I Go
episodes.overview: Prabhu looks forward to a future with Parvati. Pandey’s love for Sunita is tested. Kavita, Raheem, and Nightingale close in on Lin.

episodes.name: Dig Two Graves
episodes.overview: Lin's past catches up with him when Nightingale arrives. Later, Lin makes a shocking discovery. Karla offers Kavita information for the article.

episodes.name: Banquet of Consequences
episodes.overview: Zhou initiates war. Khader tries to stop Kavita’s article from printing. Maurizio seeks revenge. Lin says his goodbyes.

episodes.name: All the Way From There Just to Get to Here
episodes.overview: Kavita’s article goes to print, causing an all-out battle. Lin seizes an opportunity to escape. Season finale.
